headerDisplay: Automatic discovery and creation of Tasmota devices in your Homebridge environment.  To enable discovery please ensure that your Tasmota device has HASS Auto Discovey enabled ( setOption19 1 ).
footerDisplay: For further details please see the [README](https://github.com/NorthernMan54/homebridge-tasmota/blob/master/README.md). To manage your Tasmota devices [click here](http://tasui.shantur.com/#/findDevices)

name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log

mqttHost.title: Mqtt Host Address
mqttHost.description: This is the name / ip address for your MQTT Server.

mqttUsername.title: Username
mqttUsername.description: This is the Username for your MQTT Broker.

mqttPassword.title: Password
mqttPassword.description: This is the Password for your MQTT Broker.

cleanup.title: Disconnected Device Cleanup Timing
cleanup.description: Cleanup of devices no longer connected too or responding on the network.  Time is in hours, defaults to 1 Day.  Maximum value is 596 hours ( 24 days ).  IF set to 0, cleanup is disabled.

history.title: Enable support for sensor data history logging
history.description: Enable logging and graphing of historical sensor information. Must use a HomeKit app that supports data graphing to see charts.

historyInterval.title: Update interval for historical data.
historyInterval.description: Update interval for the logging of history data.  Time is in minutes, defaults to 10 minutes. ( Development testing only. )

filter.title: Filter device discovery topic ( Deprecated, please use filter allow )
filter.description: Regular expression to filter discovery topic messages against. ie "F52066|00F861" limit discovery to these two devices.

filterAllow.title: List discovery message topics allowed from discovery
filterAllow.description: A list of regex's specifying allowed disocvery topics. If this is non-empty all non-specified topics will be blocked.

filterDeny.title: List discovery message topics removed from discovery
filterDeny.description: A list of regex's specifying topics to skip. Any matching mqtt topic will always be skipped, even if it matches a filterAllow rule.

effects.title: RGB Light Effects
effects.description: Enable ability to select RGB light effects.  Requires adding an additional accessory/UI widget for each RGB light.

injections.buttonText: Add additional topic to inject or overide.

topic.title: Message Topic to apply override to.
topic.description: Unique portion of the discovery topic. ie from this topic `homeassistant/binary_sensor/00FF8D_BTN_1/config` `00FF8D_BTN_1` is unique

injection.title: Key and Value to inject/over write in original discovery message

form.title: Device Discovery Filtering
form.description: Control which devices are discovered and included with Homebridge.

items.title: Topic regex to allow
items.description: A list of regex's specifying allowed disocvery topics. If this is non-empty all non-specified topics will be blocked.

items.title: Topic regex to filter/deny
items.description: A list of regex's specifying topics to skip. Any matching mqtt topic will always be skipped, even if it matches a filterAllow rule.

form.title: MQTT Discovery Message Injection
form.description: Ability to inject/over write portions of a MQTT Discovery message.
